title: The Learning: EP.01 digs into the process of creating the new Yeti 160E eMTB
content:
The first eMTB built specifically to race the e-EWS? That’s the story behind the development of Yeti’s newest bike, the 160E. A development process that Yeti took their time with, considering the new challenges of creating a new suspension design that worked in harmony with an e-bike motor. The first episode of The Learning focuses

The post The Learning: EP.01 digs into the process of creating the new Yeti 160E eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
